column5: Anybody going to lac seul for opener? Should be good fishing,low water and a early spring. Look for early june spots and you should do very good. Hope to pick up a couple of 30 inch plus opening weekend.
Teddie our group will be at Goose Bay in one month. Help us out by posting details about the catch!! Part of our group now includes a school teacher and his student sons. Have a great trip!
My Wife and I will be fishing the NW & SW sections the last week in June. Any reports between now and then would be appreciated.
Will post next week how things went. Looking for a good opener.
Hey Teddi, I'll be in Evergreen in 2 days! Think the fish will be on the spots on the way out of Sawmill? What depth do you think? I'm so excited!
For the giant rock piles in 1 to 2 fow. If the water levels are low, lower units on the motor are the preferred bait for those rock piles. Lucky guys, opening weekend! Happy Trails!
i will be there tomorrow. see you at the motor shed saturday morning and give you some tips.
Sounds like a plan...We're in cabin 1
